org.codehaus.groovy.grails.orm.hibernate.cfg.GrailsDomainConfiguration

org.codehaus.groovy.grails.orm.hibernate.cfg   
 

Uses of GrailsDomainConfiguration in org.codehaus.groovy.grails.orm.hibernate.cfg
 

Classes in org.codehaus.groovy.grails.orm.hibernate.cfg that implement GrailsDomainConfiguration
 class DefaultGrailsDomainConfiguration
          Creates runtime configuration mapping for the Grails domain classes based on the work done in the Hibernate Annotations project
 class GrailsAnnotationConfiguration
          Allows configuring Grails' hibernate support to work in conjuntion with Hibernate's annotation support
 

Methods in org.codehaus.groovy.grails.orm.hibernate.cfg that return GrailsDomainConfiguration
 GrailsDomainConfiguration GrailsDomainConfiguration.addDomainClass(GrailsDomainClass domainClass)
          Adds a domain class to the configuration
